entities.name: Contract
entities.description: Agreement to provide customer service during a specified amount of time or number of cases.

attributes.name: contractId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contract.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: emailAddress
attributes.description: The primary email address for the entity.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Type a title or name for the contract that indicates the purpose of the contract.

attributes.name: activeOn
attributes.description: Enter the date when the contract becomes active.

attributes.name: allotmentTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of allotment that the contract supports.

attributes.name: billingCustomerId
attributes.description: Select the customer account or contact to which the contract should be billed to provide a quick link to address and other customer details.

attributes.name: billingEndOn
attributes.description: Enter the end date for the contract's billing period to indicate the period for which the customer must pay for a service.

attributes.name: billingFrequencyCode
attributes.description: Select the billing schedule of the contract to indicate how often the customer should be invoiced.

attributes.name: billingStartOn
attributes.description: Enter the start date for the contract's billing period to indicate the period for which the customer must pay for a service. This defaults to the same date that is selected in the Contract Start Date field.

attributes.name: billToAddress
attributes.description: Choose which address to send the invoice to.

attributes.name: cancelOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the contract was canceled.

attributes.name: contractLanguage
attributes.description: Type additional information about the contract, such as the products or services provided to the customer.

attributes.name: contractNumber
attributes.description: Shows the number for the contract for customer reference and searching capabilities. You cannot modify this number.

attributes.name: contractServiceLevelCode
attributes.description: Select the level of service that should be provided for the contract based on your company's definition of bronze, silver, or gold.

attributes.name: contractTemplateAbbreviation
attributes.description: Shows the abbreviation of the contract template selected when the contract is created.

attributes.name: contractTemplateId
attributes.description: Choose the contract template that should be used to determine the terms of the contract, such as allotment type, available hours, and billing frequency.

attributes.name: customerId
attributes.description: Select the customer account or contact to provide a quick link to additional customer details, such as address, phone number, activities, and orders.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Shows for the duration of the contract, in days, based on the contract start and end dates.

attributes.name: effectivityCalendar
attributes.description: Days of the week and times during which customer service support is available for the duration of the contract.

attributes.name: expiresOn
attributes.description: Enter the date when the contract expires.

attributes.name: netPrice
attributes.description: Shows the total charge to the customer for the service contract, calculated as the sum of values in the Net field for each existing contract line related to the contract.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: netPriceBase
attributes.description: Value of the Net Price in base currency.

attributes.name: originatingContract
attributes.description: Choose the original contract that this contract was created from. This information is used to track renewal history.

attributes.name: serviceAddress
attributes.description: Choose the address for the customer account or contact where the services are provided.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the contract is in draft, invoiced, active, on hold, canceled, or expired. You can edit only the contracts that are in draft status.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the contract's status.

attributes.name: totalDiscount
attributes.description: Shows the total discount applied to the contract's service charges, calculated as the sum of values in the Discount fields for each existing contract line related to the contract.

attributes.name: totalDiscountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Discount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalPrice
attributes.description: Shows the total service charge for the contract, before any discounts are credited. This is calculated as the sum of values in the Total Price field for each existing contract line related to the contract.

attributes.name: totalPriceBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Price in base currency.

attributes.name: useDiscountAsPercentage
attributes.description: Select whether the discounts entered on contract lines for this contract should be entered as a percentage or a fixed dollar value.

attributes.name: accountId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the contract is associated.

attributes.name: billingAccountId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account to which the contract is to be billed.

attributes.name: billingContactId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contact to whom the contract is to be billed.

attributes.name: contactId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contact specified for the contract.
